    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Merske enote - ponovitev</string>
            <string language="en">Units of measurement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßeinheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unités de la mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidades de medida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità della misura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδες της μέτρησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Unidades de medida</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zgodbica o dveh fantih, ki popolnoma narobe uporabljata merske enote. Učenci v zgodbici odkrivajo napake.</string>
            <string language="en">Short story that uses wrong units of measurement. Identify and correct mistakes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">merska enota</string>
            <string language="en">unit of measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kilogram</string>
            <string language="en">kilogram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">minuta</string>
            <string language="en">minute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">meter</string>
            <string language="en">meter</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Geschichte, die falsche Maßeinheiten 
benutzt. Kennzeichnen Sie und beheben Sie Fehler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire courte qui utilise les unités de la 
mesure fausses. Identifiez et corrigez les erreurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">História curta que usa unidades de medida 
erradas. Identifique e corrija erros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia corta che usa le unità della misura 
errate. Identifichi e corregga gli errori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη ιστορία εκείνες οι λανθασμένες μονάδες 
χρήσεων της μέτρησης. Προσδιορίστε και διορθώστε τα λάθη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia corta que utiliza unidades de medida 
incorrectas. Identifique y corrija los errores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kilogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Minute</string>
          </keyword>
